description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scores 51 points to help the Oklahoma City Thunder to a 50th win of the season against the Houston Rockets.
title: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander stars as Oklahoma City Thunder secure 50th win of season
title_page: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander stars as Oklahoma City Thunder secure 50th win of season - BBC Sport
maintext:
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 51 points to help the Oklahoma City Thunder to a 50th win of the season against the Houston Rockets in the NBA.
Gilgeous-Alexander made all 10 of his free throws and also had seven assists in a 137-128 win.
It is the fourth time the 26-year-old has scored 50 or more points in a game since January, having never done so before then.
"Whether it's 50, whether it's 27, whether it's 17 - as long as we win, I have fun with it. It's a fun night," said Gilgeous-Alexander.
"I'm just trying to be aggressive, trying to get my team energy, trying to make the right play. Whatever the ball and the game tells me to do, I do."
The Western Conference leaders have won 13 of their past 15 matches to improve to 50-11 for the season, with no other side in the division having yet won 40.
